position.marginalia_text: sicca, qua[e] fit per vas Sapientu[m], et modo putrefactionis. Per istam vero clavem incipit opus, & fit per ip[s]am postmodum extractio reliquarum trium claviu[m], & cognoscuntur. Mixtum igitur ac putrefactum a[e]quatum pra[e]dictum, iterum in mundo Aludel (nam aliud vas no[n] p[o]t[est] inge[m] sustinere, recipiatur. Colloceturq[ue] in furno generationis, ac detur ignis, vt totum illud in Marthek deveniat, absq[ue] aliqua terminatione ignis pra[e]termissa: quia motus debet esse continuus (vt scitis) et non interruptus.

marginalia.translation: Dry [water] which is made with the vase of the sages and the mode of putrefaction. Through that key indeedthe operation begins and through that also there subsequently comes about the extraction of the remainder of the three keys, and they are then known to you. The substance is then pressed and mixed and putrefied in a clean aludel, for no other type of jar can withstand the heat required for our purposes. This is once again placed in the generation-furnace and the fire lit so that it reaches the Marthek. The fire must not be allowed to go out, because the motion must be continuous and uninterrupted

position.marginalia_text: Tertius motus natura[e] est augmentu[m], quod fit ad modu[m] augmenti luna[e]

marginalia.translation: The third motion of nature is augmentation, which is made by the mode of augmenting the moon.

position.marginalia_text: sic etiam Magnesia incipit per fimu[m] rubificari [etc]

marginalia.translation: In this way magnesia also began to be reddened through the smoke.

position.marginalia_text: Trituratio vero augmentat: eo quod luna post 15 diminitur et in trigenta augme[n]tat. Fit etiam ha[e]c coniunctio admodo[m] corporis et anima[e]. Na[m] sicut anima corpus ingreditur, et continet ip[su]m, sic fumus albus corpus suum. Unde inquit Alphidius Prosequente fugie[n]ti obviante, ab eis fuga aufertur, et veritas sequit[ur]

marginalia.translation: The alteration increases just as the moon wanes after 15 [days] and waxes inafter30 [days]. Also, this conjoining imitates the manner in which the body and soul interact. For just as the ingressing soul vivifies the body, so does the animated white smoke vivify the its body. About this, Alphidius said: By pursuing the snatched away, and the truth follows.
